fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
Base:$25
1 Member:$110
2 Members:$325
3 Members:$620
4 Members:$750
5 Members:$1200

Members cost $125 each

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Once you receive 5 members, the Death Star becomes fully operational, and will require 3 turns with all 5 members to charge up. Upon being fully charged, you will pick one property you do not own or not owned by anyone to destroy. It will effectively become mortgaged for the next 20 turns. Any money that would be gained from mortgaging it will be sent to you, including external bonuses (such as houses and hotels)
